name: Geoventurers
description: YouthMappers chapter at SUNY at Fredonia
extendedDescription: GeoVenturers is a group of students joining together across a number of majors on our campus that see geospatial technologies as a tool to serve others and to bring people together. Mentoring for the group brings in science education from the department of curriculum and instruction.Â We hope that we can bring our skills to play in helping make people's lives better.
